_comment: OpenClaw Tool Policy - Security Hardening Phase 3.1

_blocked_tools_explanation.browser: Prevents autonomous web browsing (prompt injection risk from web content)
_blocked_tools_explanation.exec: Prevents shell command execution (critical security risk)

_allowed_tools_explanation.web_search: Built-in web search (not browser automation, safe)
_allowed_tools_explanation.web_fetch: Built-in URL fetching (not browser automation, safe)

_notes: This policy locks down dangerous tools while preserving core agent functionality
Agents can still: chat, read files, search web, fetch URLs, manage sessions
Agents CANNOT: execute shell commands, browse web, modify files, manage processes
To enable a blocked tool, remove it from 'deny' array and optionally add to 'allow'
Never enable 'elevated' mode unless absolutely necessary - it bypasses all restrictions
_installation: Copy this file to ~/.openclaw/openclaw.json in WSL2:
Or manually create ~/.openclaw/openclaw.json with this content
Restart OpenClaw gateway: openclaw gateway restart
